scripts.diff: npm run build && cdk diff JournalingDBStack-* JournalingStack-*
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cdk deploy -O deploy-output.json JournalingDBStack-* JournalingStack-*
scripts.destroy: npm run build && cdk destroy JournalingDBStack-* JournalingStack-*
scripts.diff:db: npm run build && cdk diff JournalingDBStack-*
scripts.deploy:db: npm run build && cdk deploy -O deploy-output.json JournalingDBStack-*
scripts.destroy:db: npm run build && cdk destroy JournalingDBStack-*
